home.text_base_description: Luxury Live Auction! Bidding to start from $899,000.00! Location, outdoor space, views, and value - welcome home to Victoria Mews! Upon entering, stash belongings in the entryway closet while greeted by soaring ceilings and updated floors. Curl up by the earthy tile work fireplace or venture outside to the deck to take in the downtown and Bay Bridge sparkling lights. Whip up a cuisine in the open-concept kitchen and dine alfresco or in the elegant hexagonal dining room featuring picturesque stained glass. The spacious main bedroom with elegant sconces showcase an ensuite split bath with dual sinks. The second bedroom can accommodate a desk and the guest bath holds the in-unit laundry. 1 car parking, storage room, and wonderful amenities- tennis court, pool, mosaic tiled hot tubs, and gym complete this classy condo on Carolina.
